alert.note: Alert for Marengo (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 16 at 2:29PM CDT until further notice by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Alabama, including the following county, Marengo. * WHEN...Until 530 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 229 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause small stream flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Demopolis, Linden, Uniontown, Jefferson, Thomaston, Myrtlewood, Faunsdale, Dayton, Chickasaw State Park, Freddie Jones Field, Pin Hook, Consul, Old Spring Hill, Gallion and Demopolis Lock And Dam.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
